definitions: To write or print with an initial capital letter or in capital letters.
To convert into capital; to use for one's own advantage.
To supply with capital; to raise money for.
To compute the present value of (an annuity, etc.).
examples: Always capitalize the first word of a sentence.
She managed to capitalize on her opponent's mistake.
The company needs to capitalize its new venture.
You can capitalize the income stream to determine its worth.
